channel.title: engineering on Nathan R. Yergler
channel.description: Recent content in engineering on Nathan R. Yergler

item.title: Extending Create React App with Babel Macros
item.description: I have a co-dependent relationship with Create React App.

item.title: On Product Engineering
item.description: I’ve been writing software and working in teams for well over a decade now.

item.title: Advice for the New Guy
item.description: We have three people joining the team at Eventbrite in the next month, and we’ve been talking about how to “indoctrinate” them in the Eventbrite Way.

item.title: New Foundations
item.description: I’ve written a little about how I think about technical debt, and what it means to live with it.

item.title: Living With It
item.description: So now that I’ve talked about what I think of when I say “technical debt”, I want to dig in on the other half of the title, “Living With It”.

item.title: Living With Technical Debt, Part One
item.description: I’m speaking at Velocity next month on “Living with Technical Debt”.
